Enough people have replied for this game to work and it will go ahead.
Thanks. Not enough people have answered yet to confirm this game but you will be informed if they do.
This game already has enough players and may have started.
You should receive a confirmation text with this one.
There seems to be a mistake. That code was not found.
Someone suggests a game of tennis:
Invitations sent. You will also have to reply. Code:
You have successfully been removed from the invitation list. To resume receipt of invitations you must re-join.
You are now away. Invitations will be paused until you return by texting back.
You are now back. Invitations will resume.
Welcome. You will now be automatically invited to football and can use the other features. Text \'syntax\' to find out more.
